name: Mystic Motors
description: Mystic Motors is an action-packed car racing game where players race their unique NFT cars to earn real money. Mystic Motors has an array of unique features on offer, including magic spells and car upgrades. These features will add an element of strategy and skill to the game, allowing racers to compete on a much more competitive slate. The game will also have ultra-realistic graphics and will be the first high-quality, sustainable NFT racing game to hit the market. Mystic Motors will be launched on both desktop and mobile, allowing users to play to earn anytime, anywhere.
